forumNotes.author: Dietmar
forumNotes.content:
Hi all,

today I have a lot of fun with a Asus z87i-pro board. 3dmark 2001 shows 106000 points on a gtx 980.

This is a very nice board for xp . No yellow questionmark remains in device manager.

But the very best is: After making USB bootfriendly, the asmedia 3.0 driver with

System Reserved and start 0 in registry for hub and also for the usb device,

starts full XP SP3 in 2(!) seconds.

It is unbelievable fast, boot device is a USB stick Sandisk Extreme pro Usb3.1, shows now with CrystalDismark5

300 MByte/s,

have a nice day

Dietmar

forumNotes.author: Wonko the Sane
forumNotes.content:
Hi, Dietmar, good to see you around :smile: (and of course carrying good news).

Wonko
